sdf:title: Fault Interrupter Switch
sdf:copyright: Copyright 2019 Open Connectivity Foundation, Inc. All rights reserved.
description: This Resource describes a fault interrupter switch (on/off/faulted). The Property "state" is an enum. A state of "on" means that the switch is on. A state of "off" means that the switch is off. A state of "faulted" means the switch is faulted, in such a state an UPDATE is not possible.
